biases.name: NEUTRAL
biases.description: Zuania is failing and needs help from it's neighbours
biases.headline: Years of economic downturn turn into dependency
biases.text: After so many years of the country being in an economic rut, Zuania has become dependent of Xayan gifts and help from neighboring countries. The most helpful one being Albia.

biases.name: FAILURE
biases.description: The government failed its people by not doing enough
biases.headline: What happens when a Government fails
biases.text: After so many years of the country failin its people, Zuania has become dependent on the kindness of neighboring countries. The most helpful one being Albia.

biases.name: COLONIAL PRESSURE
biases.description: The pressure of a colonial state has lead to the downturn of this country
biases.headline: Years of Xayan pressure leads to dependency
biases.text: After so many years of Xaya putting their metaphorical boots on Zuanias neck, Zuania has become dependent of them. This slow process is becoming increasingly obvious as the emmigration rate rises year by year among the lower classes who can still somewhat afford it.
